name: Duckpin Design
description:
Strategic approach. Powerful follow-through. Brand communications that win. That’s how we roll.
We have over 25 years of experience. We are a creative design agency based in Baltimore, MD.
We offer a wide range of creative services for a wide range of budgets. No matter the size of the project, we get our hands dirty and do what it takes to get it done. Whether you need business cards or a mobile app or anything in between, we won’t oversell or promise something we can’t deliver.
